profile_summary: As a Talent Lead, I excel in **full-cycle recruiting**, **talent acquisition**, and implementing **structured hiring systems**. With over 9 years of experience, I leverage **data-driven decision making** to optimize **candidate experience** and enhance **performance metrics**. My expertise includes **sourcing techniques** and **ATS best practices**, ensuring a streamlined hiring process in **high-growth environments**. I foster strong **stakeholder partnerships** through effective **communication skills** and a commitment to **process improvement**. Additionally, I possess integrity and curiosity, with a proven ability to hire across engineering and AI sectors, including **executive hiring**. My familiarity with **EU/UK and US hiring practices**, combined with experience with **Ashby**, enables me to drive technical excellence and diversity in recruitment.
